plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions

It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

plugins.name: Pager
plugins.description:
Design-Ready File Templates in Seconds

Stop rebuilding your file structure every time.

Pager helps you spin up clean, structured Figma files with reusable templates built from your own component libraries or ours.


Whether you're starting a new product flow, setting up for research, or handing off to devs, Pager gives you a smart starting point so you can focus on design, not setup.


With Pager, you can:

Import full-page layouts from your published library components


  1. Use default templates for wireframes, UI, research, and more
  2. Create dynamic templates with text, boolean, and variant controls (Pro)
  3. Build faster with consistent, scalable structure


No setup? No problem.

Start from scratch or pick a default template.

Upgrade to Pager Pro anytime to sync your own library and automate your team’s workflow.


📚 View Documentation

🧩 Explore Example Templates
plugins.tagline: Go from blank canvas to design-ready in seconds.

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

131062.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: Randomize
plugins.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

129638.name: Randomize
129638.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
129638.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

plugins.name: Skeema
plugins.description:
What is Skeema?

Skeema is a Figma plugin that integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. It allows frontend developers and designers to access API schemas for specific design components, making it easier to align designs with backend structures and speed up the development process.


How does Skeema work?

It connects your Figma designs to the relevant API documentation. By clicking on a design element, you can instantly view the associated endpoint documentation, eliminating the need to search through long API docs.


Who is Skeema for?

This plugin is designed for frontend and backend developers, and teams who work with API-driven applications. It helps bridge the gap between design and development, making UI-based API integration and collaboration smoother and more efficient.


What are the key benefits of using Skeema?

  1. 🚀 Faster API integration: No more switching between tools. Get API docs directly inside Figma.
  2. 🎯 Better accuracy: Ensure your design components match the API structures, reducing development errors.
  3. 👩‍💻 Streamlined collaboration: Designers and developers stay aligned, minimizing back-and-forth communication.


Do I need technical skills to use Skeema?

While Skeema is built with developers in mind, it's intuitive enough for designers to use as well. Its UI is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing Figma workflow, making it accessible for anyone involved in the design and development process.


What APIs does Skeema support?

Skeema is designed to work with OpenAPI (Swagger) specifications, but it can support a wide range of RESTful APIs. As long as your API has proper documentation, Skeema can link it to your Figma designs.


Is Skeema free?

Skeema offers both a free version with basic features and a premium version with advanced features such as team collaboration, extended API support, and priority access to updates.


Can I use Skeema with my team?

Yes! Skeema is built for collaborative teams. You can easily share API-linked designs with your development team, ensuring that everyone stays on the same page and works with the latest API documentation.
plugins.tagline: Skeema integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. Simply click to view docs.

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

125915.name: Preview Card Creator
125915.description:

  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
125915.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

plugins.name: Arreglo
plugins.description:
https://arreglo.ai


Arreglo is a Figma plugin that helps music producers visualize song arrangements. Using AI with semantic pattern recognition, it generates musically intelligent arrangements based on your instrument patterns and track names, making it easy to plan and understand song structures.
plugins.tagline: Finish tracks faster with AI generated arrangement ideas!

140887.name: Arreglo
140887.description:
https://arreglo.ai


Arreglo is a Figma plugin that helps music producers visualize song arrangements. Using AI with semantic pattern recognition, it generates musically intelligent arrangements based on your instrument patterns and track names, making it easy to plan and understand song structures.

Version 6 – Improved Help & Error Handling
Released: July 2025

This update adds a new help modal with usage instructions and improves error messages for unreadable image uploads.
140887.tagline: Finish tracks faster with AI generated arrangement ideas!

plugins.name: Guru Guides
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that delivers UX guidelines and customisable content, seamlessly integrating design system guides into Figma workflows.


Read the article


Guideline customisation

Connect Contentful to Guru Guides to customise guidelines for your organisation, tailoring them to specific projects, components, or patterns.


Watch the walkthrough


Default guidelines

Guru Guides offers default guidelines to help novice designers master modern web design by adopting essential components and best practices.


Benefits

Explore how consistent design principles enhance user experience, ensure brand alignment, and streamline team collaboration.
plugins.tagline: Customisable UX guidelines for Figma. Connect Contentful or use defaults to streamline design.

plugins.name: Applink
plugins.description: Applink is a simple yet effective plugin that enhances collaboration in Figma by allowing users to copy and share local URLs instead of the standard Figma.com links. This ensures seamless navigation directly from the Figma app to the app, eliminating the detour through a browser. Perfect for teams, Applink streamlines the sharing process by saving time and simplifying workflows.
plugins.tagline: Effortless link sharing, straight from app to app

plugins.name: Turtles
plugins.description:
Turtles is a simple utility to that selects every layer under your selected layer. When working on mobile UI this is a cumbersome task. No more!


  1. Select a layer
  2. Run "Turtles"
  3. You're done! Everything below is selected ✌️

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

113549.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
113549.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: iGradient
plugins.description:
iGradient helps users create advanced, customizable gradients directly inside Figma. It offers powerful tools that make designing with gradients more creative, flexible, and fun.


  1. Create mesh, Bézier, and sharp gradient styles
  2. Apply unique warp effects like noise, gravity, or circular flow
  3. Manually adjust mesh points for precise control
  4. Generate or extract color palettes from images
  5. Add natural-looking noise textures
  6. Preview and apply gradients instantly to frames or images
plugins.tagline: Advanced gradient generator with mesh and warp effects.

139847.name: iGradient
139847.description:
iGradient helps users create advanced, customizable gradients directly inside Figma. It offers powerful tools that make designing with gradients more creative, flexible, and fun.

  2. Apply unique warp effects like noise, gravity, or circular flow
  3. Manually adjust mesh points for precise control
  4. Generate or extract color palettes from images
  5. Add natural-looking noise textures
  6. Preview and apply gradients instantly to frames or images
139847.tagline: Advanced gradient generator with mesh and warp effects.

plugins.name: Basketball Game!
plugins.description:
🏀 It's a basketball!

Step away from pixels, schemes and animation — it’s time to reset your mind with a game of precision: basketball!

Perfect for designers, developers, marketers, and anyone who needs a fun, stress-free break between tasks.


Don’t hesitate — fire that ball into the hoop!


by @nezhnik


⸻


🏀 Это баскетбол!

Отвлекись от пикселей, схем и анимаций — самое время разгрузить голову игрой на точность!

Идеально подойдёт дизайнерам, разработчикам, маркетологам и всем, кому нужен весёлый перерыв между задачами и никакого и стресса.


Не тормози — в корзину мяч запульни!


автор @nezhnik
plugins.tagline: Just one word: BASKETBALL!

plugins.name: FigJam Planning Card Creator
plugins.description:
Add structured planning cards to your FigJam boards for agile planning and project management. This plugin helps teams quickly create consistent planning cards with fields like objectives, dependencies, requirements, and time estimates.


Key features:

  1. Import multiple cards at once using YAML or JSON format
  2. Create custom cards with structured fields (title, objective, dependencies, requirements, estimated lift, dates)
  3. Smart placement options - add cards inside sections or below any selection
  4. Pre-formatted cards with proper styling and typography
  5. Great for setting up sprint planning, backlog grooming, and project roadmapping


Works with sections and sticky notes. Select where you want cards and choose from built-in templates, create custom cards, or paste card definitions to bulk import.


📄 YAML/JSON Templates & Examples

📖 Documentation

🏢 Made by Prelude
plugins.tagline: Create structured planning cards for agile workflows using templates or bulk import

plugins.name: RocketPen - Generate UI with AI and edit freely
plugins.description:
RocketPen is a tool that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to help users create UI designs.

RocketPen aims to significantly boost your productivity.


For more information, please visit: https://rocketpen.site


Value

📌Open Editing Permissions: AI-generated designs can be flexibly edited and modified

🚀Boost Design Efficiency: Smart generation replaces manual drawing

🎨Maintain Design Consistency: Automatically adapts to brand design specifications

💬Natural Language Interaction: Generate professional designs with simple descriptions

📱Multi-platform Design Support: Unified design for Web/Mobile/Desktop platforms

📦Design Asset Reuse: By using the Chrome extension together, you can convert any websites into editable Figma designs.


Features

Text-to-Design Generation

Generate UI design drafts based on DesignTokens through text descriptions


Website-to-Design File Conversion

Convert any website into editable Figma design files, requires use with the Chrome extension RocketPenSelector


DesignToken

Support variables definition for DesignToken with visual DesignToken output


Quick Chart Generation

Support common chart types including bar charts, line charts, pie charts, radar charts, etc.


Precise Content Generation

Generate corresponding content through text descriptions within specified Frames


Precise Resource Import

Import icons, images and other resources through text descriptions:

Generate four high-definition animal images


Generate a navigation bar with four buttons: Chat, Contacts, Discover, Settings



Notes

🔒 Privacy Protection: We do not store any user data. Only DesignTokens (variables) are uploaded, and all generated design files remain stored locally on your device. Your data security is fully protected.


🚧 Development Status: This plugin is currently in active development. We're continuously refining the model and workflows to deliver higher-quality design outputs and an improved user experience.



Thank you for your support and understanding! If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to provide feedback.
plugins.tagline: Your Vision,AI-Powered.Generate UI designs instantly with AI, then edit freely to match your vision

plugins.name: Tablify
plugins.description:
Tablify is a powerful and flexible plugin that turns structured data into clean, styled tables directly in your Figma files. Whether you’re working with CSVs, Google Sheets, Excel files, or even Word documents, Tablify makes it effortless to visualize your data with consistency and control.


Features


Multiple Input Formats


  1. Upload from CSV, TSV, Excel (.xlsx/.xls), Word (.docx), PDF, HTML, XML, ODS, ODT
  2. Supports Google Sheets via public URL — just paste the link, choose a sheet, and you’re ready to go
  3. Drag & drop supported for local files


Intelligent Parsing


  1. Detects and handles multiple tables per document (e.g. Excel sheets or Word tables)
  2. Automatically cleans and parses content for structured layout
  3. Handles complex table structures, colspans, and headers


Design-Ready Tables


  1. Generates clean, structured Figma components
  2. Supports auto layout or fixed layout styles
  3. Responsive to Figma color variables, padding, radius, fonts, and more


Customization Options


  1. Auto Layout
  2. Header Row
  3. Style Variables (automatically created and bound)
  4. Automatically generates reusable tokens for colors, sizes, and text styles


Perfect for


  1. UI and product designers
  2. Dashboards, admin panels, data-heavy UIs
  3. Rapid prototyping with live spreadsheet content
  4. Importing structured data into Figma layouts with no manual copying


Why Tablify?


Unlike basic table creators, Tablify focuses on precision, flexibility, and deep Figma integration. It’s built for speed and scale — helping you go from spreadsheet to structured layout in seconds.


💬 Questions or feedback? Telegram ・ Email

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Table Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Magic Todo
plugins.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.


✅Tasks Tab (available now): create and rename folders, add & remove tasks, check tasks off to move them into your Completed list, and restore with one click. Everything is saved between sessions.


✨Magic Tasks Tab (coming soon): type or paste free-form requirements and click “Generate Magic Tasks” to have AI instantly spin up a new folder full of actionable tasks.


Use Magic Todo today to keep your design work on track—and watch for our AI-powered task generator in the next release.
plugins.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

138503.name: Magic Todo
138503.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.

138503.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

plugins.name: Atomic by BigBasket
plugins.description:
Built this to enhance design and development efficiency in BigBasket.


Atomic transforms a single hex code into a complete set of design tokens and themes, instantly applying your brand's unique identity across all your apps and websites. This powerful plugin streamlines multi-brand design systems and campaigns, allowing you to effortlessly generate themes, export developer-ready tokens, and maintain consistency across every product.


Features:


Theme Generator

Define your core brand colors and let Atomic intelligently adjust shades to create a complete palette. You can then export this palette directly to your Figma canvas or instantly generate Figma variables as a complete theme. This helps you create brand modes instantly with proper semantics, enabling faster iterations for brand campaigns and seamless experimentation with colors, fonts, and effects.


Export to JSON

Export all your Figma design tokens directly to JSON, providing developers with a consistent and up-to-date source of truth. This significantly speeds up hand-offs and reduces implementation discrepancies.


Effects

Precise shadow colors and configure them for smoother, more nuanced visual effects. Apply consistent effects across all your brands, updating global styles with ease.


Spacing & Radius

Establish a consistent visual rhythm and hierarchy using dedicated tokens for spacing and border radius. You can use default values or easily adjust them to perfectly align with your brand guidelines.


Neutrals and Semantics

Automatically generates essential primitives and neutral colors. These foundational elements are crucial for building a robust and flexible design system that scales across multiple brands.



Any feedback?

Connect at hello@uxmurali.com

accepted.name: Murali
accepted.description: Product Designer who strives to create meaningful experiences that make people's lives better.

plugins.tagline: Your Brand, Your Styles, Instantly. Just One Click.

plugins.name: Content Fillr
plugins.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!


Key Features:

  1. ⚡️ Auto-fill selected frames with unique, realistic avatar images.
  2. ✏️ Instantly generate AI-powered text content tailored to your needs.
  3. 🎯 Easy-to-use filters for avatars by gender.
  4. 🌐 Free avatar library sourced from Unsplash for hassle-free use.


Save time, boost productivity, and focus on the creative work you love.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars 🚀

138396.name: Content Fillr
138396.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!


Key Features:

  1. ⚡️ Auto-fill selected frames with unique, realistic avatar images.
  2. ✏️ Instantly generate AI-powered text content tailored to your needs.
  3. 🎯 Easy-to-use filters for avatars by gender.
  4. 🌐 Free avatar library sourced from Unsplash for hassle-free use.


Save time, boost productivity, and focus on the creative work you love.
138396.release_notes:
🌟 New Feature: Auto-Fill Logos in Your Designs!
You can now auto-fill selected frames with brand logos, just like avatars!

Here’s how it works:
1. Select your frames or shapes
2. Choose Logo from the Type dropdown
3. Hit Generate & Fill

Logos will be applied instantly, pulled from my curated logo library hosted on a fast, secure CDN.
138396.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars 🚀

plugins.name: Brand compliance check
plugins.description:
Branding compliance check Figma Plugin


Purpose

The Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.


Features

  1. Design Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.
  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.


Usage guidelines

  1. Select Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.
  2. Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
plugins.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned

135406.name: Brand compliance check
135406.description:

  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.

plugins.name: datify
plugins.description:
Quickly update or increment dates across selected frames or text layers. It's perfect for tables, planners, and any layout where dates need to be updated regularly.


  1. Set a start date and automatically increment dates within each frame or across multiple frames
  2. Auto-detect the existing date values across selected frames
  3. Retain the original date format or choose from a list of supported formats
  4. Skip hidden layers
  5. Choose whether to increment dates continuously across all selected frames or restart within each frame
  6. Set the increment to 0 to update all date values to the same date
  7. Enter a minus sign (–) before the number to decrement the dates instead.


📅 Supported date formats:

  1. MMM D (Jan 31)
  2. D MMM YYYY (31 Jan 2025)
  3. D MMMM YYYY (31 January 2025)
  4. MMMM D, YYYY (January 31, 2025)
  5. YYYY-MM-DD (2025-01-31)
  6. DD/MM/YYYY (31/01/2025)
  7. DD-MM-YYYY (31-01-2025)
  8. D/M/YYYY (5/6/2025)
  9. M/D/YY (1/31/25)
  10. YYYY/MM/DD (2025/01/31)
  11. MMMM YYYY (January 2025)
  12. D MMM YY (31 Jan 25)
  13. D.M.YYYY (31.01.2025)
  14. YYYY. M. D (2025. 1. 31)
plugins.tagline: A quick way to update and format dates in your designs

plugins.name: Figue
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: SVG Hell Yeah!
plugins.description:
666% more evil. 0% outlined text.


🔥 Export SVGs with Figma variables

💀 Keep your text unflattened, unholy

🩸 Sacrifice ids, groups, and other sins

🧨 Prettify the chaos into clean, readable code


Summon. Optimize. Burn.

Your SVGs shall rise... from hell.


Source code: https://github.com/PavelLaptev/figma-svg-export

accepted.name: Pavel Laptev
accepted.description: Hi! My name is Pavel Laptev. I'm a digital designer. Love design, frontend, art and architecture. Make things work, write articles, believe in opensource.

plugins.tagline: SVGs so pure, they make angels scream

plugins.name: Add Section
plugins.description:
Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

  1. Select elements (frames, rectangles, even other sections)
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Add section to put a new section around your selected elements


Resize existing sections to have the correct padding

  1. Select one or more sections
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Resize Sections to adjust all selected sections
plugins.tagline: Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

131159.name: Add Section
131159.description:
Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

  1. Select elements (frames, rectangles, even other sections)
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Add section to put a new section around your selected elements


Resize existing sections to have the correct padding

  1. Select one or more sections
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Resize Sections to adjust all selected sections
131159.release_notes:
- Added a way to fix the padding on existing sections (Resize Sections button)
- Fixed a bug where the plugin closed after each use
- Improved performance
131159.tagline: Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

plugins.name: Code-Generator Plugin
plugins.description: Want a quick mockup code to describe your figma UI? just simply select your block of design, provide your open api key and you will get your design written as code in seconds with OpenAI API
plugins.tagline: generate your selected UI into code

139183.name: Code-Generator Plugin
139183.description: Want a quick mockup code to describe your figma UI? just simply select your block of design, provide your open api key and you will get your design written as code in seconds with OpenAI API

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access the OpenAI API to generate code based on user input. The plugin also uses jsDelivr to export generated code to zip file and cdn.tailwindcss.com to preview generated html

139183.release_notes: preview images in plugin and display images in html
139183.tagline: generate your selected UI into code
